alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lewis (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued May 15 at 10:16PM EDT until May 17 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TUESDAY NIGHT THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures around 30 possible late Tuesday night into early Wednesday morning. * WHERE...Jefferson and Lewis counties. * WHEN...From late Tuesday night through Wednesday morning. Additional frost or freeze headlines may also be needed Wednesday night into early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops and other cold sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
